notes: These orcs play and sing songs in [[Orcsoberfest Island]].
sounds: Hey you! Meet me backstage later!
name: Orc Musician
behaviour: It is unknown how these creatures behave in an actual battle with players.
location: Four of these orcs can be seen in [[Orcsoberfest Island]], {{Mapper Coords|text=here|132.17|121.87|7|2|1|0.50.5}}.
strategy: There is no strategy to face them since they can't be reached.
